info.title: Sharing Product Details
info.description: The Open API serves the business functions associated with Products offered by the bank.

Authorisation.name: Authorisation
Authorisation.description: An Authorisation Token as per https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6750

x-fapi-customer-ip-address.name: x-fapi-customer-ip-address
x-fapi-customer-ip-address.description: The User/Customer's IP address if the User/Customer is currently logged in with the TPP.

x-fapi-auth-date.name: x-fapi-auth-date
x-fapi-auth-date.description:
The time when the User/Customer last logged in with the TPP. 
All dates in the HTTP headers are represented as RFC 7231 Full Dates. An example is below: 
Wed, 27 May 2020 19:43:31 GMT+03:00

x-fapi-interaction-id.name: x-fapi-interaction-id
x-fapi-interaction-id.description: An RFC4122 UID used as a correlation id.
An RFC4122 UID used as a correlation id.
An RFC4122 UID used as a correlation id.
An RFC4122 UID used as a correlation id.
An RFC4122 UID used as a correlation id.

ErrorCode.description: Low level textual error code, e.g., XYZ.OBF.Field.Missing

Message.description:
A description of the error that occurred. e.g., 'A mandatory field isn't supplied' or 'RequestedExecutionDateTime must be in future'
BOBF doesn't standardise this field

Path.description: Recommended but optional reference to the JSON Path of the field with error, e.g., Data.Initiation.InstructedAmount.Currency

Url.description: URL to help remediate the problem, or provide more information, or to API Reference, or help etc

OBErrorResponse.description: An array of detail error codes, and messages, and URLs to documentation to help remediation.

Code.description: High level textual error code, to help categorize the errors.

Id.description: A unique reference for the error instance, for audit purposes, in case of unknown/unclassified errors.

Message.description: Brief Error message, e.g., 'There is something wrong with the request parameters provided'

OBSupplementaryData.description: Additional information that can not be captured in the structured fields and/or any other specific block.

OBReadSharingProductDetails.description: Returns a collection of Sharing Product details.

Data.description: Aligning with the read write specs structure.

ProductDetails.description: Product details associated with the all product categories.

CategoryName.description: Producty category name used by ASPSPs

CategoryCode.description: Product category code used by ASPSPs

ProductDescription.description: A brief description of the product

ProductCode.description: Product Code for Banks operational purpose

SubProductCode.description: Sub-Product Code for Banks operational purpose

Segment.description: Product segment such as lifestyle, travel, reward points, etc.

Currency.description: Payment and transaction currency as applicable on the selected card

OnetimeFee.description: First time membership or fee in XYZD payable on getting a card

AnnualFeeAndCharges.description: Recurring fees and charges in XYZD payable periodically

FeeWaiver.description: This includes the conditions for fee waiver if any applicable on the selected card

AddOnCards.description: This includes the conditions and limit for add on cards where a card holder can apply for add-on cards for his/her family under the same account

CardLimit.description: Transaction limit offered by banks for the customer. This also includes the limits for sub transaction such as ATM withdrawal limit, merchant transaction limit, etc.

InterestRates.description: Interest rate payable on repayment post due date

Eligibility.description: 'This covers nationality, age, employment status, income and credit score'

DocumentsRequired.description: List of documents required for getting a credit card

Benefits.description: 'List of Benefits offered by this product'

OffersOnTheCard.description: Some cards have great offers and discounts if used with a particular vendor, website or company. Also banks have tie ups with offices, educational institutions etc. and offer them special rates

RewardType.description: Some cards are specifically made to suit customers spending habits. For e.g. travel, aviation, lifestyle, shopping, cashback etc.

RewardsProgram.description: Rewards program offered by Banks including cashback and redeemable options. Fuel charge waivers and airport lounge access will also be covered here

JoiningGiftsOrBonus.description: To get customers to apply for their card, banks offer welcome gifts and bonuses. This could be some latest gadget or bonus points and miles.

TermsAndConditions.description: 'This includes a summary of the terms and conditions such as hidden charges, compliance requirements and other bank specific requirements'

ProductDetails.description: Product details associated with the all product categories.

Segment.description: Product segment such as lifestyle, travel, reward points, etc.

Currency.description: Payment and transaction currency as applicable on the selected loan type

InitialDeposit.description: Initial amount payable by the customer in XYZD excluding taxes

HandlingFees/Supplementary.description: Loan handling fees applicable for products in XYZD excluding taxes

MinTenure.description: Minimum duration of loan period in months

MaxTenure.description: Maximum duration of loan period in months

InterestRates.description: Interest payable on repayment of the loan amount

Eligibility.description: 'This covers nationality, age, employment status, income and credit score'

DocumentsRequired.description: List of documents required for getting a loan

EmploymentStatus.description: Employment status of the loan applicant

CreditScore.description: Credit score of the loan applicant

Collateral.description: list of collateral accepted against loan if applicable

Benefits.description: 'List of Benefits offered by this product'

BonusPack.description: Free Priority/ Premium/ Easy Banking plan with credit card, 360° reward and welcome offers

FreeMortgageValueAssessment.description: Free assessment of the value of the mortgage

TermsAndConditions.description: 'This includes a summary of the terms and conditions such as hidden charges, compliance requirements and other bank specific requirements'

tnc-summary.description: Any material conditions and specific features such as salary transfer, minimum equity for mortgage facility, loan to value ratio etc.

OverdraftLimit.description: Limit offered by banks for the customer based on turnover and spending levels in XYZD per month

DocumentsRequired.description: List of documents required for opening a current account

Benefits.description: 'List of Benefits offered by this product'

RelationshipManager.description: This covers the benefits of availing RM under few conditions

ODprotection.description: Enjoy Current Account Overdraft Protection for clearing cheques

MinBalance.description: This describes the minimum balance required to keep the account active

MultipleDebitCards.description: This includes details of add on debit cards where a account holder can apply for add-on cards for his/her employees under the same account

TermsAndConditions.description: 'This includes a summary of the terms and conditions such as hidden charges, compliance requirements and other bank specific requirements'

QuickerInvestmentWithdrawal.description: Customer can withdraw the investments within 24 hours of the request submitted

Identification.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of a branch of a financial institution

ATMServices.description: Describes the type of transaction available for a customer on an ATM.

Access24HoursIndicator.description: Indicates that the ATM is available for use by customers 24 hours per day

SupportedLanguages.description: Identification of the language name according to the ISO 639-1 codes. The type is validated by the list of values coded with two alphabetic characters, defined in the standard

SupportedCurrencies.description: All ISO 4217 defined currency  supported by the ATM

MinimumPossibleAmount.description: Minimum amount allowed for a transaction in the service

LocationCategory.description: Indicates the environment of the ATM.

Name.description: Long name associated with the specified location category

Description.description: Description to describe the purpose of the location category

PostalAddress.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services or in free format text.

items.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services, that is presented in free format text.

BuildingNumber.description: Number that identifies the position of a building on a street.

PostCode.description: Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers that is added to a postal address to assist the sorting of mail.

TownName.description: Name of a built-up area, with defined boundaries, and a local government.

CountrySubDivision.description: Identifies a subdivision of a country such as state, region, county.

Country.description: Nation with its own government, occupying a particular territory.

GeoLocation.description: Geographic location of the ATM specified by geographic coordinates or UTM coordinates.

Longitude.description: Angular measurement of the distance of a location on the earth east or west of the Greenwich observatory.The longitude is measured in decimal degrees.

Identification.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of a branch of a financial institution

Name.description: Name by which a branch is known and which is usually used to identify that branch

Type.description: Codeset to indicate if a branch is physically in 1 location or is mobile

Accessibility.description: Accessibility is the ability and ease a customer can access a service, good, associate, or facility. Features which make the Bank accessible to disabled people

SupportedLanguages.description: Identification of the language name according to the ISO 639-1 codes. The type is validated by the list of values coded with two alphabetic characters, defined in the standard

SupportedCurrencies.description: All ISO 4217 defined currency  supported by the Branch

ContactInfo.description: Communication device number or electronic address used for communication.

ContactType.description: Contact type such Phone, Fax and email

ContactContent.description: Collection of information that identifies a phone/Fax number/ email, as defined by telecom services.

ContactDescription.description: Description of contact such as main phone number, alternate phone number, Fax number, alternate fax number, email and alternate email

Name.description: Long name associated with the code

Description.description: Description to describe the purpose of the code.

PostalAddress.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services or in free format text.

items.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services, that is presented in free format text.

BuildingNumber.description: Number that identifies the position of a building on a street.

PostCode.description: Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers that is added to a postal address to assist the sorting of mail.

TownName.description: Name of a built-up area, with defined boundaries, and a local government.

CountrySubDivision.description: Identifies a subdivision of a country such as state, region, county.

Country.description: Nation with its own government, occupying a particular territory.

GeoLocation.description: Geographic location of the ATM specified by geographic coordinates or UTM coordinates.

Longitude.description: Angular measurement of the distance of a location on the earth east or west of the Greenwich observatory.The longitude is measured in decimal degrees.

TPPOAuth2Security.description: TPP client credential authorisation flow with the ASPSP
